attributes.additional_details: The additional day of rest will lead to increased productivity during the four working days, with more energy and creativity as a result of being happier and well rested. People would generally be happier which will have a positive impact on society more widely. The additional leisure time will encourage greater family engagement. There may also be health benefits. Ultimately we shouldn't be living to work - life/work balance needs to be addressed.
attributes.background: Reduce the standard working week to four days (Monday-Thursday) by increasing the hours of work per day to 9.5 to make up the hours and retain salaries.
